snippet: A strong early season lifted the company’s performance and prompted a better full-year outlook.
abstract: Strong early seed-selling season lifts agricultural giant Monsanto's earnings; reports fiscal second-quarter profit of $1.21 billion, or $2.24 a share, up 19 percent from $1.02 billion, or $1.88 a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 15 percent to $4.75 billion from $4.13 billion.
lead_paragraph: A strong early season lifted the company’s performance and prompted a better full-year outlook.
